Title: Wakening Sickness
Description:
You will forgive my current state. I have slept for many years.

A Klaxxi'va should have been here to attend my Wakening with kypari sap... but you will have to do.

I sense the buzzing of sapflies to the south. They gorge on the nourishing sap I need. Bring them to me.
ObjectivesText: Bring 100 Sapfly Bits to Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver in the Terrace of Gurthan.
CompletionText: Without nourishment, I will die where I stand.
